json.q: Life is really simple, but men insist on making it complicated.
json.h:
“Life is really simple, but men insist on making it complicated. ” —
Confucius

json.q: We are most nearly ourselves when we achieve the seriousness of the child at play.
json.h:
“We are most nearly ourselves when we achieve the seriousness of the child at play.” —
Heraclitus

json.q: It's not whether you get knocked down, its whether you get back up.
json.h:
“It's not whether you get knocked down, its whether you get back up.” —
Vince Lombardi

json.q: Surround yourself only with people who are going to take you higher.
json.h:
“Surround yourself only with people who are going to take you higher.” —
Oprah Winfrey

json.q: Art, like morality, consists of drawing the line somewhere.
json.h:
“Art, like morality, consists of drawing the line somewhere.” —
Gilbert Chesterton

json.q: If you pick up a starving dog and make him prosperous he will not bite you. This is the principal difference between a dog and man.
json.h:
“If you pick up a starving dog and make him prosperous he will not bite you. This is the principal difference between a dog and man.” —
Mark Twain

json.q: Happiness is the meaning and the purpose of life, the whole aim and end of human existence.
json.h:
“Happiness is the meaning and the purpose of life, the whole aim and end of human existence.” —
Aristotle

json.q: Forgive those who have hurt you.
json.h:
“Forgive those who have hurt you.” —
Les Brown

json.q: People are weird. When we find someone with weirdness that is compatible with ours, we team up and call it love.
json.h:
“People are weird. When we find someone with weirdness that is compatible with ours, we team up and call it love.” —
Dr. Seuss

json.q: By seeking and blundering we learn.
json.h:
“By seeking and blundering we learn.” —
Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

json.q: Love never keeps a man from pursuing his destiny.
json.h:
“Love never keeps a man from pursuing his destiny.” —
Paulo Coelho

json.q: A random act of kindness, no matter how small, can make a tremendous impact on someone else's life.
json.h:
“A random act of kindness, no matter how small, can make a tremendous impact on someone else's life.” —
Roy T. Bennett

json.q: Life and death are of supreme importance. Time swiftly passes by and opportunity is lost.
json.h:
“Life and death are of supreme importance. Time swiftly passes by and opportunity is lost.” —
Dogen

json.q: The more often a stupidity is repeated, the more it gets the appearance of wisdom.
json.h:
“The more often a stupidity is repeated, the more it gets the appearance of wisdom.” —
Voltaire

json.q: Death walks faster than the wind and never returns what he has taken.
json.h:
“Death walks faster than the wind and never returns what he has taken.” —
Hans Christian Andersen

json.q: As one grows weaker one is less susceptible to suffering. There is less hurt because there is less to hurt.
json.h:
“As one grows weaker one is less susceptible to suffering. There is less hurt because there is less to hurt.” —
Jack London

json.q: Do not look for a sanctuary in anyone except your self.
json.h:
“Do not look for a sanctuary in anyone except your self.” —
Buddha

json.q: The fact of the matter is that there will be nothing learned from any challenge in which we don't try our hardest.
json.h:
“The fact of the matter is that there will be nothing learned from any challenge in which we don't try our hardest.” —
Josh Waitzkin

json.q: The goal is not to show how great you are to others, but how vulnerable you are to yourself.
json.h:
“The goal is not to show how great you are to others, but how vulnerable you are to yourself.” —
Maxime Lagace

json.q: The thing about smart people is that they seem like crazy people to dumb people.
json.h:
“The thing about smart people is that they seem like crazy people to dumb people.” —
Stephen Hawking

json.q: The consequences of today are determined by the actions of the past. To change your future, alter your decisions today.
json.h:
“The consequences of today are determined by the actions of the past. To change your future, alter your decisions today.” —
Unknown

json.q: With self-discipline, almost anything is possible.
json.h:
“With self-discipline, almost anything is possible.” —
Theodore Roosevelt

json.q: Knowledge isn't power until it is applied.
json.h:
“Knowledge isn't power until it is applied.” —
Dale Carnegie

json.q: Abundance of knowledge does not teach men to be wise.
json.h:
“Abundance of knowledge does not teach men to be wise.” —
Heraclitus

json.q: Failure means you've now learned another valuable lesson that pushes you one step closer to success.
json.h:
“Failure means you've now learned another valuable lesson that pushes you one step closer to success.” —
Steve Harvey

json.q: To be in harmony with the wholeness of things is not to have anxiety over imperfections.
json.h:
“To be in harmony with the wholeness of things is not to have anxiety over imperfections.” —
Dogen

json.q: In youth we run into difficulties. In old age difficulties run into us.
json.h:
“In youth we run into difficulties. In old age difficulties run into us. ” —
Beverly Sills

json.q: Confidence breeds beauty.
json.h:
“Confidence breeds beauty. ” —
Estee Lauder

json.q: Falling down is not failure. Failure comes when you stay where you have fallen.
json.h:
“Falling down is not failure. Failure comes when you stay where you have fallen.” —
Socrates

json.q: The power of human thought grows exponentially with the number of minds that share that thought.
json.h:
“The power of human thought grows exponentially with the number of minds that share that thought.” —
Dan Brown

json.q: People who bite the hand that feeds them usually lick the boot that kicks them.
json.h:
“People who bite the hand that feeds them usually lick the boot that kicks them.” —
Eric Hoffer

json.q: To travel is to be alive, but to get somewhere is to be dead.
json.h:
“To travel is to be alive, but to get somewhere is to be dead.” —
Alan Watts

json.q: Remain calm, serene, always in command of yourself. You will then find out how easy it is to get along.
json.h:
“Remain calm, serene, always in command of yourself. You will then find out how easy it is to get along. ” —
Paramahansa Yogananda

json.q: You don't get in life what you want; you get in life what you are.
json.h:
“You don't get in life what you want; you get in life what you are.” —
Les Brown

json.q: Give more than you think you can, trusting that you are richer than you think.
json.h:
“Give more than you think you can, trusting that you are richer than you think.” —
Jon Kabat-Zinn

json.q: There is an essence of when you are fearless, you become more creative.
json.h:
“There is an essence of when you are fearless, you become more creative.” —
Gurbaksh Chahal

json.q: Think and wonder, wonder and think.
json.h:
“Think and wonder, wonder and think.” —
Dr. Seuss

json.q: What do we live for, if it is not to make life less difficult for each other?
json.h:
“What do we live for, if it is not to make life less difficult for each other?” —
George Eliot

json.q: Be courteous to all, but intimate with few, and let those few be well tried before you give them your confidence.
json.h:
“Be courteous to all, but intimate with few, and let those few be well tried before you give them your confidence. ” —
George Washington

json.q: A memory is a beautiful thing, it's almost a desire that you miss.
json.h:
“A memory is a beautiful thing, it's almost a desire that you miss.” —
Gustave Flaubert

json.q: If you realize that you're the problem, then you can change yourself, learn something and grow wiser. Don't blame other people for your problems.
json.h:
“If you realize that you're the problem, then you can change yourself, learn something and grow wiser. Don't blame other people for your problems.” —
Robert Kiyosaki

json.q: The primary cause of unhappiness is never the situation but your thoughts about it.
json.h:
“The primary cause of unhappiness is never the situation but your thoughts about it.” —
Eckhart Tolle

json.q: If you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.
json.h:
“If you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change. ” —
Wayne Dyer

json.q: Closing your eyes and listening to silence is self-care.
json.h:
“Closing your eyes and listening to silence is self-care.” —
Maxime Lagace

json.q: Everyone you admire was once a beginner.
json.h:
“Everyone you admire was once a beginner.” —
Jack Butcher

json.q: Ability is a poor man's wealth.
json.h:
“Ability is a poor man's wealth.” —
John Wooden

json.q: Happiness is a quality of the soul...not a function of one's material circumstances.
json.h:
“Happiness is a quality of the soul...not a function of one's material circumstances.” —
Aristotle

json.q: Muddy water is best cleared by leaving it alone.
json.h:
“Muddy water is best cleared by leaving it alone.” —
Alan Watts

json.q: Leadership is solving problems
json.h:
“Leadership is solving problems” —
Colin Powell

json.q: I put my heart and soul into my work, and I have lost my mind in the process.
json.h:
“I put my heart and soul into my work, and I have lost my mind in the process.” —
Vincent van Gogh
